channel.title: Follow your heart (by niilo)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/niilo-hiltunen/follow-your-heart
It took me a month to complete the production of this track. It’s also the first time I added any sort of vocals to a track. I’d really appreciate if anyone would like to listen to it and possibly tell me how you liked it!
